_exec_summary.SummaryText:
Executive Summary for Dorman Brothers, L.L.C.-Genoa Plant

For further information regarding this plan, please contact:
Michael Dorman
19230 County Road 55
Burlington, Colorado  80807
719/346-7970

1.  The Faciltiy Policy
The owners, members, and employees of Dorman Brothers, L.L.C. are committed to the prevention of accidental release of anhydrous ammonia.  If an accidental release should occur, the facility is prepared to work with the local fire department and other agencies to mitigate any release and minimize the impact of the release to people and the enivorment.

2.  Facility Information
This failcity switched ownership on June 17, 2004 and themost current safety measures were implemented at that time. The primary activity at this facility is the storage of fertilizer for sale to farmers.  Anhydrous ammonia is received, stored and distributeded for direct application.  The ammonia is delivered by truck.

3.  The Accidental Release Prevention Progrm
This facility has implemented the provisions of Safety Requirments for the Strage and Handling of Anhydrous Ammonia K-61-1, published by the American National Statards Institute, Inc. and the standards of the U.S. Occupational Sfaety and Health Adminstration, 29 CFR 1910.111, Storage and Handling of Anhydrous Ammonia.

4.  The Five Year Accident History
This facility was put into business on June 17, 2004 and there has been no accidental releases of anhydrous ammonia that have caused any deaths, injured or caused significant property damage at the facility, or any offsite consequences of a release.

5.  The Amergency Action Plan
The Facility has:
-A written Emergency Action Plan
-It will proved SARA Title III information to the state and local authorities.
-Has done employee training.

6.  Planned Changes to Improve Safety
Safety improvements will be an on-going process at the facility.  Periodic inspections are performed to assess the maintenance of safe conditions.  There are no additional specific anhydrous ammo
nia safety recommendations at this time.
